author: Steve Clemons
title: Coronavirus Report: The Hill's Steve Clemons interviews Miami Mayor Francis X. Suarez
description: The Hill's Steve Clemons interviews Miami Mayor Francis X. Suarez, who was one of the first people to test positive for the COVID-19 virus in Miami-Dade County, Fla., and to donate his blood plasma, after recovery, to cri...
content: The Hill's Steve Clemons interviews Miami Mayor Francis X. Suarez, who was one of the first people to test positive for the COVID-19 virus in Miami-Dade County, Fla., and to donate his blood plasma, after recovery, to critically ill patients fighting the dise… [+8416 chars]
